title: You, Me & Her 4
overview: Raul Costa gets the opportunity to have two hot girls a once as his girlfriend, Romy Indy, invites Mimi Cica to the party.  Evelyn Claire and Will Pounder used to date. Although they've broken up and Will has a new girlfriend in Maya Woulfe,  Chad Alva and his wife Kylie Quinn have heard that Alex Coal is an excellent sex therapist. Kylie wants Alex to tell her what to do, and Chad becomes standoffish as Alex tries to guide the couple into a communication exercise.  Mick Blue has been acting as a sugar daddy to two girls who each think they're the only one. He has decided it's time for them to meet. He tells both girls to come to his place for a surprise.
